data.lyric:
[ti:On My Way to You]
[ar:Cody Johnson]
[al:On My Way to You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]On My Way to You - Cody Johnson
[00:03.48]Lyrics by：Brett James/Tony Lane
[00:06.97]All the boats I've missed
[00:09.93]All the hell I've caused
[00:12.95]All the lips I've kissed
[00:15.88]All the love I've lost
[00:18.71]I got kicked around
[00:21.71]I've been black and blue
[00:24.75]On my way to you
[00:31.10]All the stars I've seen
[00:34.06]All the songs I've sung
[00:37.10]All the beers I've drank
[00:40.13]All the damage done
[00:42.99]I was just passin' time
[00:45.98]Kinda just passin' through
[00:48.94]On my way to you
[00:55.07]Every curve every ditch
[00:58.42]Every turn every bridge
[01:01.04]I left behind me up in smoke
[01:04.46]Every fork in the road
[01:07.50]It was all worthwhile
[01:09.96]When I finally saw you smile
[01:13.22]Every highway every heartbreak
[01:16.49]Every mountain every mile
[01:22.73]I got the radio up
[01:25.61]Sun is goin' down
[01:28.52]I'll take a left at the bank
[01:31.54]And I'll head straight through town
[01:34.31]So baby put on that dress
[01:37.51]A little sweet perfume
[01:40.28]'Cause I'm on my way to you
[02:07.52]Yeah every curve every ditch
[02:11.23]Every turn every bridge
[02:13.90]I left behind me up in smoke
[02:17.26]Every fork in the road
[02:20.48]It was all worthwhile
[02:22.78]When I finally saw you smile
[02:26.24]Every highway every heartbreak
[02:29.50]Every mountain every mile
[02:35.68]All the boats I've missed
[02:38.75]All the hell I've caused
[02:41.69]All the lips I've kissed
[02:44.78]All the love I've lost
[02:47.52]I thank God for that
[02:50.45]I guess he always knew
[02:53.17]I was on my way to you
[02:59.76]On my way to you
[03:05.55]On my way to you
data.trans:
[ti:On My Way to You]
[ar:Cody Johnson]
[al:On My Way to You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.48]//
[00:06.97]我错过了很多艘船
[00:09.93]我犯过很多次错
[00:12.95]我亲过很多女孩
[00:15.88]我失去了很多爱
[00:18.71]我忍受着命运的摆布
[00:21.71]浑身伤痕累累
[00:24.75]在去找你的路上
[00:31.10]我看过无数星辰
[00:34.06]我唱过无数歌曲
[00:37.10]我喝了很多啤酒
[00:40.13]我造成了很多伤害
[00:42.99]我只是在消磨时间
[00:45.98]只是在消磨时间
[00:48.94]在去找你的路上
[00:55.07]走过弯道 越过沟渠
[00:58.42]经过转角 跨过桥梁
[01:01.04]过往的一切都化做云烟
[01:04.46]沿途有无数的岔口
[01:07.50]我知道一切都是值得的
[01:09.96]我终于见到了你的笑容
[01:13.22]经过高速 忍着心碎
[01:16.49]翻过高山 慢慢向前
[01:22.73]我打开收音机
[01:25.61]太阳就要下山了
[01:28.52]我会在河边左转
[01:31.54]径直穿过那个城镇
[01:34.31]宝贝 穿上漂亮的衣服
[01:37.51]喷一点好闻的香水
[01:40.28]因为我正在去找你的路上
[02:07.52]走过弯道 越过沟渠
[02:11.23]经过转角 跨过桥梁
[02:13.90]过往的一切都化做云烟
[02:17.26]沿途有无数的岔口
[02:20.48]我知道一切都是值得的
[02:22.78]我终于见到了你的笑容
[02:26.24]经过高速 忍着心碎
[02:29.50]翻过高山 慢慢向前
[02:35.68]我错过了很多艘船
[02:38.75]我犯过很多次错
[02:41.69]我亲过很多女孩
[02:44.78]我失去了很多爱
[02:47.52]我感谢上帝的安排
[02:50.45]我想他一直都知道
[02:53.17]我正在去找你的路上
[02:59.76]在去找你的路上
[03:05.55]在去找你的路上
